name: Waffle
long_description: Travel agents, fitness instructors, and personal tutors are using Waffle to manage their online presence. Since launching 3 weeks ago, our users have created 600 websites on Waffle. We’re now building plugins with Stripe, Resend, and Neon so users can manage their payments, email marketing, and booking system on Waffle too. We’re targeting $200B+ in annual spend by US SMBs on their customer acquisition tech stack.
